name: No. 2
description:
This is an incomplete clone/redesign of the MSX game Banana.

 

Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move the Arrow

X to Jump

Postmortem:

The purpose of this second recreation was to, again, practice using the engine. This specific game was difficult to do because it had multiple game states that the player could be in, and all of them had their own mechanics and behaviors, while also having strangely complex AI. The original game is also racist, so I wanted to make it not racist and cute by changing the sprites and thus changing the context. While I was working on the game, I came down with a bad head cold which developed into a sinus infection. So obviously I couldn't finish it. What I mainly learned from this “failed” attempt in cloning Banana is that my health needs to come before a game, and a failed prototype is only a failure if it wasn’t made. Even a half-baked prototype can teach something.
